T

Toolbar - Class in metro.GameScreen
This is the bar on the side with the "build station", "build tracks", "show line view" and "create train" buttons.
Toolbar(Point, Point) - Constructor for class metro.GameScreen.Toolbar
Creates a new toolbar.
touchDown(int, int, int, int) - Method in class metro.METRO
Is executed when the user clicks with the mouse.
touchDragged(int, int, int) - Method in class metro.METRO
 
touchUp(int, int, int, int) - Method in class metro.METRO
 
TrackPlacingTool - Class in metro.GameScreen.MainView
A track placing tool is used by the player to build new tracks for the trains.
TrackPlacingTool(Point) - Constructor for class metro.GameScreen.MainView.TrackPlacingTool
Creates a new Track placing tool.
Train - Class in metro.TrainManagement.Trains
WILL handle all the train stuff like animations, etc.
Train() - Constructor for class metro.TrainManagement.Trains.Train
 
TrainLine - Class in metro.TrainManagement.Lines
A Train line is a collection of several railway connections that touches each other (building one big line).
TrainLine(String, Color) - Constructor for class metro.TrainManagement.Lines.TrainLine
Creates an empty new train line with a given title and a color.
TrainLine(ArrayList<RailwayNode>, String, Color) - Constructor for class metro.TrainManagement.Lines.TrainLine
Creates a (partly) filled train line with a name and a color.
TrainLineOverseer - Class in metro.TrainManagement.Lines
The TrainLineOverseer knows all train lines and with this overseer you can add, remove and change a train line.
TrainLineOverseer() - Constructor for class metro.TrainManagement.Lines.TrainLineOverseer
 
TrainStation - Class in metro.TrainManagement.Trains
A train station with the amount of waiting passengers and a list of connected stations.
TrainStation(Point) - Constructor for class metro.TrainManagement.Trains.TrainStation
Creates a new train station.
TrainStation(Point, int) - Constructor for class metro.TrainManagement.Trains.TrainStation
Creates a new train station.
TrainView - Class in metro.GameScreen.TrainView
 
TrainView(Point2D) - Constructor for class metro.GameScreen.TrainView.TrainView
Creates a new TrainLineView.
TrainViewBuy - Class in metro.GameScreen.TrainView
 
TrainViewBuy() - Constructor for class metro.GameScreen.TrainView.TrainViewBuy

TrainViewMain(Point, int) - Constructor for class metro.GameScreen.TrainView.TrainViewMain
